pages.text: $(li)Kangaroos are neutral animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savannas$(/l) and in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/badlands)Badlands$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can breed them giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/dead_bush)Dead Bushes$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/grass)Grass$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop kangaroo meat or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/kangaroo_hide)Kangaroo Hide$(/l) upon death.

$(li)Kangaroos can be tame with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/carrot)Carrots$(/l).$(br)$(li)Tamed Kangaroos can be ordered to Sit, Wander and Follow.$(br)$(li)You can heal hurted Kangaroos give them vegetable base food, like $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bread)Bread$(/l).$(br)$(li)Kangaroos has an inventory of 9 slots that you can access shift right clicking of them.
$(li)If you place a Helmet, Chestplate or $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l) in the pouch of your tamed Kangaroo, this one will equip these items.
